name: A Book of Secrets and Regret (Beta)
name_original: A Book of Secrets and Regret (Beta)
description:
(Beta Build)

- Story -

Going over to Reese's house is always a fun time; her mom is never around, there always seems to be an endless supply of pizza, and you get to spend your time summoning demons! Well... trying to summon a single demon that is.

You have spent countless nights trying to summon this demon, so much so that it has lost its excitement. So why is Reese still so invested in summoning it? If you succeed in summoning it what will you do from there? No matter what, beware. Summoning a demon never ends happily.

This Game was made for the Spooktober 2022 Game Jam hosted by Devtalk.
